alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 31 at 2:31AM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Blizzard conditions late this afternoon and early evening for south-central South Dakota... .A strong winter storm will bring heavy snow across southern South Dakota today. Strong gusty northerly winds will develop this afternoon with the highest speeds (above 50 MPH) over south- central South Dakota as blizzard conditions develop. Travel will be very difficult where warning are in place today. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills and the Fall River County Plains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
